pubspec.name: data_connection_checker_tv
pubspec.description: A pure Dart library that checks for internet by opening a socket to a list of specified addresses, each with individual port and timeout. Defaults are provided for convenience.
pubspec.author: Kristiyan Mitev <komapeb@gmail.com>, Spirit Navigator <contact@spiritnavigator.com>
